mn105:17.2: anabhāvaṅkate → anabhāvakate (bj, pts1ed); anabhāvaṅgate (sya1ed, sya2ed, km)
mn105:18.4: atathaṁ samānaṁ → atathaṁ sa mānaṁ (bj); atthaṁ samānaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | Evaṁmāni → evaṁ mānī (bj, pts1ed, mr); evamādi (sya-all, km)
mn105:19.6: Saupādisesoti → anupādisesoti (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | jānamāno → maññamāno (bj, pts1ed)
